text: The 1925 Tour de Hongrie was the inaugural edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 27 to 29 June 1925. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Károly Jerzsabek. The patron of the race was Miklós Horthy. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1925 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Budapest to Szombathely | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Szombathely to Győr | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Győr to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | MTK | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | MTK | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 05" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | JKK | style="text-align:right;" | + 20' 33" |} |} ==References== 1925 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie Category:June 1925 sports events
